content: be weaved in later 2 knit one round in the contrasting yarn 3 slip the first stitch of the second round then complete the round 4 knit every following round as usual knitting all stitches if you decide to change the colour again simply repeat steps 1-4 for comments or questions regarding this pattern please contact me at julietootill@gmail com you can also find me on ravelry as knittedandco 11
